title: Android APK wrapper for deployed PWA

requirements.summary: Add an Android APK packaging option that wraps the deployed PWA URL into an installable APK and document how to build/install it.
acceptanceCriteria: A buildable Android project (or build pipeline) is added to the repo that packages the existing deployed PWA URL into an installable APK.
A downloadable APK artifact is produced by the build (debug or release), with clear output location and naming documented.
The APK launches directly into the app in a full-screen/standalone experience and loads the same deployed app as the browser/PWA.
A short English README section is added explaining how to build the APK locally (prerequisites, commands) and how to install it on an Android device.

file_operations.description: Add Android/Gradle ignores suitable for committing an Android Studio project while excluding build outputs.

Document APK build and install steps in English (Android Studio/Java requirements, Gradle commands), clearly stating the output APK location and naming, and how to sideload/install on an Android device.
Add Gradle configuration needed for consistent local/CI builds (e.g., AndroidX settings, JVM args).
Define the Android project settings for the APK wrapper project.
Add top-level Gradle build configuration for the Android wrapper project.
Add Gradle wrapper script so the APK can be built with a single command without requiring a system Gradle install.
Add Windows Gradle wrapper script for building the APK on Windows machines.
Pin a Gradle version for reproducible APK builds via the Gradle wrapper.
Configure the Android app module build (applicationId, min/target SDK, signing placeholders for release builds, and tasks to assemble debug/release APKs).
Define a single launcher Activity that runs full-screen/standalone and hosts a WebView wrapper pointed at the deployed PWA URL (no extra app features beyond packaging).
Implement the minimal Activity that loads the deployed PWA URL in a full-screen WebView (including correct back navigation behavior and basic WebView settings for modern PWAs).
Add app name and a configurable string for the deployed PWA URL so changing the packaged URL does not require code edits.
Add a theme that supports a full-screen/standalone experience consistent with the PWA.
Add Android launcher icon configuration for the wrapper app (may reference included mipmap assets).
Add round launcher icon configuration for the wrapper app (may reference included mipmap assets).
Add launcher icon bitmap for hdpi density (can be derived from existing PWA icons).
Add launcher icon bitmap for mdpi density (can be derived from existing PWA icons).
Add launcher icon bitmap for xhdpi density (can be derived from existing PWA icons).
Add launcher icon bitmap for xxhdpi density (can be derived from existing PWA icons).
Add launcher icon bitmap for xxxhdpi density (can be derived from existing PWA icons).
